title: Closest...

properties.name: description
properties.value: Closest... is a list of the closest location or teleport to another location. That includes banks, furnaces, anvils, ranges, altars, farming patches, and resources like rocks, trees or fishing spots.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Closest...
 This article is currently in the middle of an expansion or major revamping.
The information contained within it should not be considered fully accurate and/or complete. You can help by contributing to it.

Closest... is a list of the closest location or teleport to another location. That includes banks, furnaces, anvils, ranges, altars, farming patches, and resources like rocks, trees or fishing spots.

All distances are measured in number of tiles using Chebyshev distance, meaning an adjacent tile, diagonal or straight, is 1 distance.

There are two variants: this page which is members only and Free-to-play Closest.... Both lists are strictly the closest two things including any requirements even if it means 2277 Total level.

Contents

  • 1 Banking
  • 2 Transportation
  • 3 Construction
  • 4 Cooking
  • 5 Crafting
  • 6 Farming
  • 7 Fishing
  • 8 Herblore
  • 9 Hunter
  • 10 Mining
  • 11 Prayer
  • 12 Runecraft
  • 13 Slayer
  • 14 Smithing
  • 15 Woodcutting
  • 16 Bosses
  • 17 Shops
  • 18 Other

Banking[edit | edit source]

Main article: List of bank locations § Fastest Access
The closest... To... Description Distance Requirements
Teleport Bank Hallowed crystal shard (Costs 1 Hallowed mark) 3–4 tiles Sins of the Father
Teleport Bank Crafting cape or Max cape 7 tiles 99 Crafting
Teleport Bank Ring of Dueling to Castle Wars 7-8 tiles None
Teleport Bank Seer's Village Teleport 8-9 tiles Hard Kandarin Diary
Teleport Deposit box Crafting cape or Max cape 1 tile 99 Crafting
Teleport Grand Exchange Ring of wealth or Varrock Teleport to Grand Exchange 7-11 tiles None or medium Varrock Diary
Teleport Bank Enchanted lyre or Enchanted lyre(i) (Neitiznot Teleport) 4-7 tiles Elite Fremennik Diary
Teleport Bank Achievement diary cape (Desert Jarr) 7-9 tiles All Achievement Diaries
Minigame teleport Bank Fishing Trawler 5 tiles 15 Fishing
Fairy ring Bank DJR (West of Shayzien Encampment) 29 tiles None
Fairy ring Grand Exchange DKR 41 tiles 21 Agility
Teleport Bank Western banner 4-17 Hard Western Provinces Diary

Transportation[edit | edit source]

The closest... To... Description Distance Requirements
Teleport Spirit tree House Teleport 6 tiles 75 Construction, 83 Farming & Tree Gnome Village
Teleport Fairy ring House Teleport or Quest point cape 6 tiles All Quests or 85 Construction & Completion of Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
Teleport Gnome glider Royal seed pod or Grand seed pod 6 tiles Completion of Monkey Madness II or None
Fairy ring Gnome glider Fairy ring: AKS 27 tiles Partial completion of Fairytale II - Cure a Queen and One Small Favour
Spirit tree Gnome glider Tree Gnome Stronghold 60 tiles Completion of Tree Gnome Village
Fairy ring Spirit tree Spirit tree & fairy ring 0 tiles 95 Construction, 83 Farming, Tree Gnome Village & completion of Fairytale II - Cure a Queen
Teleport Charter Catherby Teleport Lunar Diplomacy & 87 Magic
Spirit tree Charter Spirit Tree: Brimhaven 49—55 tiles 83 Farming

Construction[edit | edit source]

The closest... To... Description Distance Requirements
House portal Bank Prifddinas 44 tiles Completion of Song of the Elves
Sawmill Bank Woodcutting Guild 54 tiles 60 Woodcutting & 75% Hosidius favour
Teleport Sawmill Lumberyard teleport 4 tiles None or reward from any Treasure Trail casket

Fire Bank Rogues' Den 0 tiles None
Teleport Windmill Skills necklace 11 tiles None but completion of Legends' Quest if the player is ironman and 32 Cooking
Bank Windmill Cooks' Guild 7 tiles 32 Cooking and Varrock hard diary, or 99 Cooking
Teleport Range Falador Park 12 tiles Ring of wealth
Teleport Range Fishing Guild 11 tiles Skills necklace and 68 Fishing
Teleport Range Mor Ul Rek 0-2 tiles Achievement diary cape
Teleport Range Lunar Isle 7-9 tiles Lunar Isle Teleport (A closed door, by default, is in the way.)

The closest... To... Description Distance Requirements
Spinning wheel Bank Crafting Guild 8 tiles 99 Crafting or hard Falador diary, also includes 1 staircase
Potter's wheel Bank Crafting Guild 8 tiles 99 Crafting or hard Falador diary

Sandpit Furnace Entrana None but you can't bring combat equipment to Entrana
Charter Bank Port Khazard 27 tiles None
Furnace Charter Port Phasmatys Completion of Ghosts Ahoy or 2 Ecto-tokens to enter
